tradein.headline: How it works

steps.title: Step one: Choose
steps.description: Select your new Smartphone, Tablet, Laptop or Watch and your trade-in device to immediately see your instant trade-in credit.

steps.title: Step two: Prep
steps.description: Check if your device meets our eligibility requirements. Then, learn how to reset your device and disable anti-theft protection here.

steps.title: Step three: Ship
steps.description: In an effort to reduce waste, reuse the box from your new device to send us your trade-in.

steps.title: Step four: Review & Finish
steps.description: Trade in your old phone with confidence. If your trade-in is declined, Samsung will return your device for free upon request, subject to certain conditions.

tradein.termsText:
Still need help?
Check out our FAQs and Terms and Conditions.
If your trade-in is declined, Samsung will return your device for free
upon request, subject to certain conditions.

sustainability.name: sustainabileMaterialsFlag
sustainability.tooltip: Product meets EPEAT standards for materials selection and greenhouse gas reductions.<sup>1</sup>

sustainability.name: energyEfficiencyFlag
sustainability.tooltip: ENERGY STAR-certified products are designed to save power, lower your bills and make a positive environmental impact.<sup>1</sup>

sustainability.name: renewableEnergyFlag
sustainability.tooltip: Assembled in the U.S. at facilities using renewable energy sources, including wind and solar.<sup>1</sup>

sustainability.name: responsibleRecyclingFlag
sustainability.tooltip: Certified Re-Newed products are refurbished by Samsung technicians, reducing your environmental impact.<sup>1</sup>

premiumCareHeader.gold: Gold Reward Members save 10% off most accessories.
premiumCareHeader.platinum: Platinum Gold Reward Members save 10% off most accessories.

tradeinVideoInfo.mainPageTitle: Want to save instantly with trade-in?
tradeinVideoInfo.title: Get up to $500 enhanced trade-in credit.
tradeinVideoInfo.subTitle: It’s easy to trade in your eligible device for carrier bill credits or instant credit through Samsung. Simply choose what works best for your lifestyle.

howTradeinWorks.headline: How it works

steps.title: Step 1: Choose
steps.description:
• Add the new Galaxy S22 Ultra series device to your cart
  • Select Verizon Device Payment Program
  • Look for the Verizon trade-in instructions after your Samsung.com cart checkout

steps.title: Step 2: Prep
steps.description:
• Device line must be on any Unlimited plan prior to ordering your new device for maximum trade value.
  • All device conditions (good or damaged) can be traded for promotion except:
    • 1.) Damaged Battery
    • 2.) Unidentifiable Device
    • 3.) Activation Lock Turned On
    • 4.) Device is reported lost or stolen

steps.title: Step 3: Ship
steps.description: • After you complete your Samsung new device order, visit the Verizon trade-in site to process your trade with Verizon. Instructions at check out!

steps.title: Step 4: Review and Finish
steps.description: • Bill credits will be applied to your Verizon account after the trade-in process is completed with Verizon

For a limited time.​ Terms and conditions apply.<sup>Ȣ</sup>

bannerData.advertisementBanner: Get up to $800 off Galaxy S23 Ultra from T-Mobile via one-time bill credit with eligible trade-in. Terms apply.<sup>B</sup>

tMobileLearnMore.subDescription:
1. Have or switch to a Magenta MAX rate plan on the T-Mobile App before device purchase.

2. Purchase a new Samsung Galaxy device with a T-Mobile Equipment Installment and pay the applicable sales tax on the pre-credit price at time of purchase.

3. Trade in an eligible device in good condition. We will email you a shipping label or you can download it form your My T-Mobile Account.

4. Receive a one-time bill credit based on your trade-in value, and the balance of the offer via 24 or 36 monthly bill credits totaling up to $800 after trade in is complete with T-Mobile.
tMobileLearnMore.agreeTerms: Contact us before cancelling service to continue remaining bill credits, or credits stop & balance on required finance agreement is due (e.g., $799.99 – Samsung Galaxy S23 128GB). ** Tax on pre-credit price due at sale. Limited-time offer; subject to change. Qualifying credit, service (Magenta MAX or other premium data plan), & trade-in (e.g., Save $800: Samsung Galaxy S22 / Save $400: Samsung Galaxy S8) required. Z Fold4 finance agreement & monthly bill credits are over 36 months for well-qualified customers. Up to $800 via bill credits; must be active and in good standing to receive credits; allow 2 bill cycles. Max 4 discounted devices/account. May not be combinable with some offers or discounts.

description: Have or switch to a Magenta MAX rate plan.
Purchase a new Samsung Galaxy phone with a T-Mobile Equipment Installment and pay the applicable sales tax on the pre-credit price at time of purchase.
Trade in an eligible device in good condition. We will email you a shipping label or you can download it form your My T-Mobile Account.
Receive a one-time bill credit based on your trade-in value, and the balance of the offer via 24 or 36 monthly bill credits totaling up to $1000 after trade in is complete with T-Mobile.

offers.promoDesc: Listen to your favorite music ad-free and even when you are offline. Get a free 6-month Spotify Premium trial when you buy any Galaxy S21 device.
offers.legal: To qualify, (1) pre-order or purchase a Samsung Galaxy S20, S20+, S20 Ultra, Z Flip, A51, A71 (additional 2020 Samsung device launches may be eligible) (“Qualifying Purchase”) from Samsung.com or the Shop Samsung app (2) install the Spotify app on your Qualifying Purchase and (3) subscribe to Spotify Premium and follow “GET PREMIUM” instructions in Spotify app to receive a Spotify 6-month Trial (“Gift”). For first-time Spotify Premium subscribers only. All steps must be completed by 03/05/21 at 11:59 pm EST, or you will forfeit your right to receive a Gift. Install and access Spotify on your Qualifying Purchase through the Google Play store (if not pre-installed). Requires subscription to a Spotify Premium account, acceptance of Spotify account terms and credit card registration. Gifts are non-transferrable and attempts to transfer will result in gifts being forfeited. Additional terms may apply. The Spotify 6-month Trial is available only on Galaxy SGalaxy S20, S20+, S20 Ultra, Z Flip, A51, A71 (additional 2020 Samsung device launches may be eligible) models purchased on Samsung.com or the Shop Samsung app starting 3/6/20.
